posts.post_content: What's so evil about trample combined with infect is that even if your opponent can block and "soak up" most of [Putrefax](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Putrefax)'s power, now his creatures are weakened. This guy is brutal, and concede-worthy if your opponent also has out a [Hand of the Praetors](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hand of the Praetors) or two.

posts.post_content:
Poisonous [Ball Lightning](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ball Lightning) with -1/+2 for two more mana? I guess it's alright because two of these would kill someone where it would take 3 ball lightnings to do the same...

I guess it comes down whether you like red or green.  
  
You know what? Let's run both.

posts.post_content:
Obviously a cornerstone card for neo-poison decks. This guy sweeps in out of nowhere and will at least get you within proliferate range.  
  
I do want to try him in extended with [Blowfly Infestation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blowfly Infestation). That's a card that liked to blow up the world and this is a card that likes it's world blown up (and it also like killing things with -1/-1 counters).
posts.html:
Obviously a cornerstone card for neo-poison decks. This guy sweeps in out of nowhere and will at least get you within proliferate range.
